avdta.dta

Class MSAAssignment

  • java.lang.Object
    • avdta.dta.Assignment
      • avdta.dta.MSAAssignment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Assignment>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FourStepAssignment

    public class MSAAssignment
extends Assignment
    This represents an assignment using the method of successive averages, and also stores the iteration number. This can be used to continue an assignment from where it left off.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MSAAssignment(DTAProject project, DTAResults results, int iter)
      Constructs the assignment for the specified project and results with the last iteration number.
      MSAAssignment(DTAProject project, DTAResults results, java.lang.String name, int iter)
      Constructs the assignment for the specified project and results with the last iteration number with the specified name.
      MSAAssignment(java.io.File input)
      Constructs the assignment from the specified directory.

      • MSAAssignment

        public MSAAssignment(DTAProject project,
                     DTAResults results,
                     int iter)
        Constructs the assignment for the specified project and results with the last iteration number. The name is set to the current date The folder name is set to an unique integer.
        Parameters:
        project - the project
        results - the results from simulating this assignment
        iter - the last iteration

      • MSAAssignment

                     DTAResults results,
                     java.lang.String name,
                     int iter)

        Parameters:

        results - the results from simulating this assignment
        iter - the last iteration
        name - the assignment name
